name: MineSweeper Clone (karlaaa)
description:
Minesweeper is a single-player puzzle video game. The objective of the game is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them.

All design assets base on WhatsApp app design.

The creator's aim made this game to challenge himself and bring joy to some on the internet. The creators don't get any money from this project and everyone have their own right to play this game for fun or whatever. Have fun!
